title: I'm stuck in a LeaverBuster Queue, when the timer hits 0, it resets back to 5 minutes.

replies.body: Really? It's obviously just a bug. Put in a support ticket where they could actually help you instead of posting about it here.

> Really? It's obviously just a bug. Put in a support ticket where they could actually help you instead of posting about it here.

I did, but that means I have to wait for a 100000 year reply.
